title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Bharara To Stay U.S. Attorney (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Bharara To Stay U.S. Attorney (Audio)
description:
Bloomberg Law host June Grasso and Greg Stohr discuss President Elect Donald Trumps decission to keep Preet Bharara as U.S. attorney for Manhattan. They spoke to Wayne State University Law School Professor Peter Henning, and Columbia Law School Professor John Coffee.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
